item.title: Bridge returned error 500! (18637)
item.content:encoded:
abolishicedenver - Instagram Bridge was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `Unable to find username in search result.`
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Instagram&context=Username&u=abolishicedenver&media_type=all&direct_links=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pauder

item.title: A one-time $600 survival check is not enough. Democrats have...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

A one-time $600 survival check is not enough.

Democrats have proposed providing $1,200 survival checks to those making less than $100k/year and a $600 federal boost in weekly unemployment benefits, but in the greatest economic crisis since the Great Depression, Mitch McConnell is pushing to slash those numbers in half!

If you want real relief, call your Member of Congress and your Senator today and ask them to actually help working families.

...

Find your Senator: https://www.senate.gov/…/contact_informati…/senators_cfm.cfm

Find your Congressmember: https://www.house.gov/representati…/find-your-representative

See MoreNot sure of your congressional district or who your member is? This service will assist you by matching your ZIP code to your congressional district, with links to your member's website and contact page. Please review the frequently asked questions if you have problems using this service. Enter your...

item.title: Rob the police station 👉
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Rob the police station 👉

Civil asset forfeiture laws, which allow police to seize property without trial, are frequently justified as tools to seize millions from kingpins. A new study reveals the median amount taken is as low as $369 in some states.

propublica.org

Police Say Seizing Property Without Trial Helps Keep Crime Down. A New Study Shows They’re Wrong.

Civil asset forfeiture laws, which allow police to seize property without trial, are frequently justified as tools to seize millions from kingpins. A new study reveals the median amount taken is as low as $369 in some states.Civil asset forfeiture laws, which allow police to seize property without trial, are frequently justified as tools to seize millions from kingpins. A new study reveals the median amount taken is as low as $369 in some states.

'Inmates escape and take guard hostage' at South Carolina prison

FIVE inmates escaped and a guard was locked in a cell at a prison in South Carolina, officials said on Sunday night. The “hostage” incident happened at McCormick Correctional Institutio…FIVE inmates escaped and a guard was locked in a cell at a prison in South Carolina, officials said on Sunday night. item.title: 😭😭 Los Mocochetes we're not crying, you're...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

😭😭 Los Mocochetes we're not crying, you're crying!!!

"A little gift from your favorite Mocosos! Here’s a song we’ve been working on especially for this Holiday season. As we feast and enjoy from the warmth of our families take a moment to remember that there are still kids in cages, families who have been divided and broken. And all they wish on this night is freedom; the opportunity to be a family once again. Our battle is far from over we shall not stop untill they are all... free! Tear down these walls! There is no freedom without freedom for all!"

https://youtu.be/HHdQVGvRK2I

#AbolishICE #AchristmascoldasICE #chingalamigra #freethemall

See More

youtube.com

A Christmas as Cold as I.C.E

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Abolish ICE DenverAmerican Friends Service CommitteeRight now, hundreds of thousands of immigrants and their families face uncertainty...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE DenverAmerican Friends Service Committee

Right now, hundreds of thousands of immigrants and their families face uncertainty because of the Trump administration’s termination of TPS. And a recent court ...ruling reversed a previous decision that protected TPS holders—and in as little as nine months, deportations could begin.
Tell Congress: Provide permanent protections for TPS and DACA recipients by creating a roadmap to citizenship for them—and all immigrants!

See More
item.author: Abolish ICE Denver

item.title: Please join the Denver Communists this New Year's Eve as we...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Please join the Denver Communists this New Year's Eve as we join with other autonomous anarchists & activists across the Colorado Front Range in solidarity with our incarcerated neighbors & political prisoners like anarchist, activist, and poet, Eric King.

What better way is there to show solidarity other than showing up, making some noise & closing out this shit show of a year together? Show up with your best NYE noise makers, demonstration banners and signs. Who knows, we ...may even try out a new flavor of 🐷. FED or Jeffco anyone?

We are planning on meeting up at Harriman Lake Park @ 7:30 pm and heading to the facility which is @ 9595 W Quincy Ave Littleton, CO 80123

**Neither we, nor the organizers of this action, are affiliated in any way with Eric King nor the Eric King Support team @SupportEricKing. They just want to show some love and and we are happy to signal boost that!**

See More

THU, DEC 31, 2020

Abolish Prisons: New Year’s Eve Noise Demo

Harriman Lake Park

· Littleton78 people interested

item.title: Abolish ICE DenverJust before Christmas Eve, Border Patrol agents on horseback surrounded No More Death's humanitarian aid station south of...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE DenverJust before Christmas Eve, Border Patrol agents on horseback surrounded No More Death's humanitarian aid station south of Tucson and told volunteers they were pursuing a warrant to raid the camp, the group said.

tucsonsentinel.com

Border agents on horseback surround No More Deaths camp just before Christmas

Just before Christmas Eve, Border Patrol agents on horseback surrounded No More Death's humanitarian aid station south of Tucson and told volunteers they were pursuing a warrant to raid the camp, the group said.Just before Christmas Eve, Border Patrol agents on horseback surrounded No More Death's humanitarian aid station south of Tucson and told volunteers they were pursuing a warrant to raid the camp, the group said.

item.title: Sterling Correctional Facility has seen the worst outbreak of...
item.content:encoded:
Abolish ICE Denver

Sterling Correctional Facility has seen the worst outbreak of Colorado’s prisons. More than 1,300 inmates there have caught the virus, 10 of whom have died.

To help you stay updated as the situation evolves, The Colorado Sun has launched this live blog with updates on closures, restrictions, and other COVID-19 developments.

coloradosun.com

Three more Colorado prisoners die from suspected coronavirus infections, bringing pandemic total to 20

To help you stay updated as the situation evolves, The Colorado Sun has launched this live blog with updates on closures, restrictions, and other COVID-19 developments.To help you stay updated as the situation evolves, The Colorado Sun has launched this live blog with updates on closures, restrictions, and other COVID-19 developments.
